bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 166, Number 170 (Wednesday, September 30, 2020)][House]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Mr. STEWART:H.R. 8446.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:Article IV, Section III[Page H5105]

item.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

item.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text:
Grand Staircase Escalante Enhancement Act

This bill establishes in certain Utah counties (1) the Escalante Canyons National Park and Preserve within the Escalante Canyons National Monument, (2) the Grand Staircase National Monument, and (3) the Kaiparowits National Monument.

The Department of the Interior shall convey to the state of Utah the Hole in the Rock Road (BLM Road 200).

bill.title: Grand Staircase Escalante Enhancement Act

item.title: To provide greater conservation, recreation, economic development and local management of Federal lands in Garfield and Kane Counties, Utah.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
